instructions.narrator: Initialize the game world and set the opening scene. Describe the starting location, initial context, and prepare to introduce the hero's first potential adventure.

actions.content:
**The Village of Millbrook - Dawn**

The morning mist clings to the cobblestone streets as you stand at the edge of Millbrook, a humble farming village nestled between rolling green hills and the dark expanse of the Whispering Woods. Thatched-roof cottages line the main road, their chimneys releasing thin wisps of smoke into the pale sky.

The village should be bustling with morning activity - farmers heading to their fields, merchants opening their shops, children playing in the streets. Instead, an unsettling quiet hangs over Millbrook like a shroud.

A weathered wooden signpost near the village well bears a hastily scrawled notice, the ink still wet with morning dew. As you approach, you can make out urgent words: *"MISSING - Elara Brightwater, age 16. Last seen three nights past near the forest edge. REWARD offered. Seek Mayor Aldric at the Copper Kettle Inn."*

From somewhere deep within the village, you hear the faint sound of worried voices and the creak of a door opening. A figure emerges from the inn - an elderly man with silver hair and deep worry lines etched across his weathered face.

The adventure begins here, traveler. What draws your attention first in this troubled village?
